name: Extension / Additional Story
flavor_text: Increases size capacity; may at most double the base size in most cases; its cost is limited to be the location's original cost at most.

name: Facade
flavor_text: Increase concealment by masking the base's true purpose.

name: Fabrication Plant
flavor_text: Produces a certain type of synthetic components automatically. Produces a net value of roughly cr 100 daily, given it is continuously supplied.

name: Forge
flavor_text: Enables Forge crafting. The size and cost depends on the forge's size.

name: Lab
flavor_text: Enables Chemical crafting. The size and cost depends on the lab's size.

name: Plantation
flavor_text: Produces a certain type of natural components automatically. Produces a net value of roughly cr 100 daily, given it is continuously supplied.

name: Vehicle Bay
flavor_text: Enables Vehicle repairs and modification

name: EMI Dynamo
flavor_text: Allows EM pulse in defense situations

name: Life Support Systems
flavor_text: Removes dependency on outside world for clean water, food and air

name: Hidden Pathways
flavor_text: Allows circling around or escaping from the enemy in defense situations

name: Surveillance System
flavor_text: Prevents being infiltrated

name: Turret Grid
flavor_text: Adds allied turrets in defense situations

name: Comms Network
flavor_text: Allows safe communication during preparation, internally and externally. Anyone trying to break encryption takes an additional -20 penalty.

name: Data Center
flavor_text: Allows advanced data mining

name: Equipment Stash
flavor_text: Allows safe storage of various types of equipment

name: Hidden Stash
flavor_text: Allows safe storage of items that won't easily be found by a search

name: Holding Facility
flavor_text: Allows safe storage of prisoners and people of interest; 2 cells each

name: Living Quarters / R\&R
flavor_text: Improves recovery through relaxation. All natural healing tests gain +10 and recovery time is reduced by half.

name: Medical Facilities
flavor_text: Increases regeneration of health. All medical attention tests to regenerate HP gain +10.

name: MedEvac / ER
flavor_text: If during a mission a character is mortally wounded, he may be extracted and survive the encounter. He will however be traumatized and gain a Bane worth roughly 4 GP.

name: Aug Surgery
flavor_text: Allows implantation surgery.
